name: Welcome to Vineyard
description:
Welcome to Vineyard is a personal challenge: create a game in 10 hours.

In this game you have to manage vines, water them, take care of them, and harvest them. You will unlock other vines with the amount of grapes collected.

Pay attention! Harvesting grapes too early, letting them die of thirst, disease or other will penalize you. Once the maximum number of penalties has been reached, you will lose the game.

Measure yourself against others thanks to the integrated Online leaderboard and become the best winegrower of Welcome to Vineyard!

Credits:

Leaderboard: LootLocker
Music: relaxing music and sounds
Rain: Digital Ruby (Jeff Johnson)
